mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sale_room ( sr_create_date, sr_rubber_amount, sr_sale_all_amount, user_id, sr_goods_num, sr_tax, sr_sale_amount, sr_state, sr_end_back_payment, sr_create_user, sr_freight, sr_is_back, del_flag, sr_bak, sr_is_device_award, sr_province, sr_sale_date ) VALUES ( #{srCreateDate}, #{srRubberAmount}, #{srSaleAllAmount}, '1', #{srGoodsNum}, #{srTax}, #{srSaleAmount}, '1', #{srEndBackPayment}, #{srCreateUser}, #{srFreight}, #{srIsBack}, '1', #{srBak}, #{srIsDeviceAward}, #{srProvince}, #{srSaleDate} );
